segments.text: Do you have any special interests besides your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My chief interest is swimming and climbing with my friends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think is the most important thing for you to be happy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think that the most important thing is you can â€™ t live all by himself . It takes a lot of people working and cooperating together . The more really close friends I have , the better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There is a reason in what you say .
segments.speaker: S1
